# ISO 9241-171 Accessibility Sweep Checklist

| Checkpoint | Clause reference | Pass/Fail/Follow-up | Evidence (screenshot, quote) | Notes / remediation |
|------------|------------------|---------------------|------------------------------|---------------------|
| Focus order follows DOM | 7.2 |                     |                              |                     |
| Keyboard users can activate primary CTAs | 7.2 |                     |                              |                     |
| Visible focus indicator meets 3:1 contrast | 7.3 |                     |                              |                     |
| Redundant cues for color changes | 7.4 |                     |                              |                     |
| Error messages identify field + fix | 7.5 |                     |                              |                     |
| Live regions or ARIA alerts for wizard status | 7.6 |                     |                              |                     |

Instructions:
- Run through the prototype twice: once keyboard-only, once with your preferred screen reader.
- Attach GIFs or text snippets for each checkpoint so engineers know what you observed.
